description: Converts all px values to rem() functions using a hotkey
command.convertSelection: PX to REM: Convert selection only
command.convertWorkspace: PX to REM: Convert all files in workspace
command.convertFileType: PX to REM: Convert all files of specific type
command.reverseConvert: PX to REM: Reverse convert (rem to px)
command.switchProfile: PX to REM: Switch configuration profile
config.directConversion: Convert directly to rem (16px → 1rem instead of rem(16))
config.minValue: Minimum px value to convert (e.g., 4 to skip 1-3px)
config.maxValue: Maximum px value to convert (e.g., 999 to skip large values like 1920px)
config.includeProperties: Convert only these properties (e.g., ['font-size', 'padding', 'margin']). Empty = all.
config.keepPxInRem: Keep px unit in rem() (rem(10px) instead of rem(10))
config.scssInterpolation: Use SCSS interpolation in calc() (#{rem(10)} instead of rem(10))
config.enableDiagnostics: Show warnings for px values (underlines px values)
config.enableCodeLens: Show 'Convert' buttons above lines with px values
config.excludeFiles: Glob patterns for files to ignore (e.g., '**/*.min.css', '**/vendor/**')
config.fileTypes: File types to consider in batch conversion
config.useDynamicBaseFontSize: Read base font size from SCSS/CSS file instead of using fixed value
config.baseFontSizeFile: Path to file with baseFontSize variable (relative to workspace root)
config.baseFontSizeVariable: Name of the variable for base font size (e.g., '$base-font-size' or '--base-font-size')
